snippet: Jewish settlers burned three Palestinian cars and scrawled graffiti on a mosque in the Israeli-occupied West Bank on Thursday, village residents said.
abstract: Jewish settlers burn three Palestinian cars and scrawl graffiti on mosque in Israeli-occupied West Bank, latest in series of such attacks; settlers have attacked Palestinian communities 586 times in 2013, up from 370 in all of 2012
lead_paragraph: Jewish settlers burned three Palestinian cars and scrawled graffiti on a mosque in the Israeli-occupied West Bank on Thursday, village residents said.

headline.main: West Bank: Settlers Said to Deface a Mosque
headline.print_headline: West Bank: Settlers Deface a Mosque
